name: Dark-GitLab
description: Dark theme for GitLab and self-hosted instances. Also supports far greater color customization, custom dark and light color-schemes and many custom features in UserCSS format at GitLab.

user.name: Vednoc
user.about: Hi! I am Vednoc, but people mostly call me Mew. Making website themes is one of the things that I absolutely love doing, so I decided to share them with the world.

additional_info: More information is available in the Dark-GitLab project. USo will be used only to reach more users and will be updated every once in a while. The screenshot features Gruvbox theme, but the theme doesn't come with it out of the box.

discussions.name: Black on black title in Code Review analytics page.
White blocks in Merge Request tabs

style_settings.label: Want to customize settings? Install the UserCSS version of this theme from GitHub.
